channel.title: Amely
channel.description: Classy E-commerce WordPress Theme for WooCommerce

item.title: New Season
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][rev_slider_vc alias="homepage-13"][amely_space height="65" height_lg="60" height_md="50" height_sm="40" height_xs="30"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="amely_wide_row" content_placement="middle"][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-1 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs" el_class="col-xl-2"][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-4"][vc_custom_heading text="Meet the trends of the season" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23333333|line_height:48px" use_theme_fonts="" google_fonts="font_family:Poppins%3A300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700|font_style:600%20semi-bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1520417127538{margin-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_text]“Simple is the best”, they say. Indeed, it is.
